translations: 肮脏的，污秽的，破烂的（sleazy 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: The music business "is one of the sleaziest businesses there is", Mr Richards argues, only one step above gangsterism.
sentences.translation: 理查兹认为，音乐界“是最垃圾的行业之一”，只比流氓团伙强那么一点。

sentences.sentence: When I was in graduate school in New York, I was so poor that I had to live in the worst apartment in the sleaziest part of town.
sentences.translation: 我在纽约读研究生的时候，我穷得只能在城里最低档的地区租公寓。
